remarks: Complex number multiplication is a continuous function.  Part of Proposition 14-4.16 of [Gleason] p. 243.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
mulcn2 $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> E. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR+ A. u e. CC A. v e. CC ( ( ( abs ` ( u - B ) ) < y /\ ( abs ` ( v - C ) ) < z ) -> ( abs ` ( ( u x. v ) - ( B x. C ) ) ) < A ) ) $.
$d A u v y z $.
$d B u v y z $.
$d C u v y z $.
$d y z $.
